resources.string: Type in a new word for the data in this game, then hit done.
There was an issue with sign in. Please try again later.
There was a problem getting the inbox intent!
There was a problem getting the select opponents intent!
Your turn is finished, you can not make any more moves.
You have used all your moves.
You can only place people and houses on the edge
The person and the house of the same color can\'t be less than 5 spaces apart
You have to put people and houses on empty spaces with green grass.
The person can\'t move there because there isn\'t a path to get there. Remember to only move your person one space at a time.
You can\'t move a person onto the edge unless they are going to their house.
You can\'t discard -- you started moving a person using your tile.
You can\'t discard a house piece.
You can\'t discard a person piece.
You can\'t play a path piece on the edge of the board
Only one person can be in a square at a time.
